description.translate: Imperial, with a single wing movement, he asserted his superiority.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Aigle rayonnant\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Impérial, d'un unique mouvement\"}","{\"text\":\"§7d'aile, il affirma sa supériorité.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Imperial, with a single wing movement,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7he asserted his superiority.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§a1 §7LUC§a1\"}"]}}
